item.title: Commands are not working
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Your suppose to put them into their own class file.

commandMap.put("jad", new Jad()); commandMap.put("poop1", new Poop()); commandMap.put("resetspec", new ResetSpec());
Than you would make three new classes
Jad
Poop
ResetSpec

Use some of the other command classes as examples.

item.title: Commands are not working
item.dc:creator: @reco reco
item.description:
@reco wrote:

each of them are separte notepads… when i open the command manager this is how everthing looks:

package com.rs2hd.packethandler.commands;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

import com.rs2hd.model.Player;

/**
*

  • Command manager.

  • @author Graham

  • @author Luke132
    */
    public class CommandManager {

    private static Map<String, Command> commandMap = new HashMap<String, Command>();
    static {
    commandMap.put(“item”, new Item());
    commandMap.put(“gfx”, new Graphic());
    commandMap.put(“emote”, new Animation());
    commandMap.put(“tele”, new Teleport());
    commandMap.put(“inter”, new Interface());
    commandMap.put(“switch”, new MagicType());
    commandMap.put(“master”, new Master());
    commandMap.put(“reset”, new Reset());
    commandMap.put(“save”, new Save());
    commandMap.put(“yell”, new Yell());
    commandMap.put(“male”, new Male());
    commandMap.put(“female”, new Female());
    commandMap.put(“kickall”, new KickAll());
    commandMap.put(“starter”, new Starter());
    commandMap.put(“lvl”, new Lvl());
    commandMap.put(“players”, new PlayerList());
    commandMap.put(“killall”, new Killall());
    commandMap.put(“npc”, new Npc());
    commandMap.put(“pnpc”, new Pnpc());
    commandMap.put(“pnpcoff”, new Pnpcoff());
    commandMap.put(“mb”, new Mb());
    commandMap.put(“mypos”, new Mypos());
    commandMap.put(“fadeall”, new Fadeall());
    commandMap.put(“noclip”, new Noclip());
    commandMap.put(“food”, new Food());
    commandMap.put(“bones”, new Bones());
    commandMap.put(“help”, new Help());
    commandMap.put(“train”, new Train());
    commandMap.put(“xteleall”, new Xteleall());
    commandMap.put(“xteleto”, new Xteleto());
    commandMap.put(“xteletome”, new Xteletome());
    }

     	if (cmd[0].equals("poop1")) {
 		p.specAmount = 9999999;
 		p.getActionSender().setConfig2(p, 300, 1000);
 	}
 	if (cmd[0].equals("resetspec")) {
 		p.specAmount = 1000;
 		p.getActionSender().setConfig2(p, 300, 1000);
 	}

    public static void execute(Player player, String command) {
    String name = “”;
    if(player == null) {
    return;
    }
    if (command.indexOf(’ ‘) > -1) {
    name = command.substring(0, command.indexOf(’ '));
    } else {
    name = command;
    }
    name = name.toLowerCase();
    if (commandMap.get(name) != null ) {
    if (player.getRights() >= commandMap.get(name).getRights())
    commandMap.get(name).execute(player, command);
    }
    }
    }

if (cmd[0].equals("::jad")) {
player.getTele().telePlayer(player, 2480, 5175, 0, 0);
player.sm(“Its BIG and RED”);
}

i tried to add a few commands but they didn’t work i tried to add the following:
::jad
::poop1
::resetspec
